meanings.definition: A small diving bird of the grebe family.
meanings.sent1: The dabchicks gracefully dove into the water to catch fish.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of dabchicks swimming in the lake.
meanings.sent3: The dabchicks had a race to see who could catch the most fish.
meanings.sent4: Her dance moves were as elegant as a dabchick diving into the water.
meanings.sent5: The dabchicks' sleek feathers glistened in the sunlight as they swam.

meanings.definition: A person who is clumsy or awkward in movement or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The new student was a dabchick in gym class, tripping over their own feet.
meanings.sent2: She felt like a dabchick trying to dance at the party.
meanings.sent3: The dabchick bumped into the door, thinking it was open.
meanings.sent4: He was a dabchick on the ice, slipping and sliding everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The dabchick's attempts at juggling ended with balls rolling everywhere.
